#summary definition of SANE_FRAME_XML

= Introduction =

SANE_FRAME_XML is a generic text based frame type that has a minimal
structure to handle things like barcodes and patchcodes.

Based on XML it can easily extended while maintaining compatibility.

= Elements =

== Barcodes ==

<barcode type="BarcodeType" length="...">
<corner x="..." y="..." />
<data>.....</data>
</barcode>
